CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Externally_Serviced_Override__c , ""),
IF ( AND( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Sub_Group__c, "Public Offtake"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Group__c, "Anchor") ),
IF( $CustomMetadata.Custom_Feature_Enablement__mdt.Subscription_Orders.Feature_is_Enabled__c=true, AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shared_Solar_System__r.Billing_Anchors__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Shared_Solar_System__r.Billing_Anchors__c, "BlueWave")) ),
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Shared_Solar_System__r.Billing_Anchors__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Shared_Solar_System__r.Billing_Anchors__c, "BlueWave")) ) ) ), TRUE, FALSE),
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Externally_Serviced_Override__c , "Externally Serviced"), true, false)
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if subscription is billed by RadianGen
CustomField.label: Externally Serviced
